home.title: StoryShot ‚Äì One-line Instagram story card maker
home.subtitle: Pick a photo or background and write a line for today. Create story cards for Instagram stories, KakaoTalk profile, or blog thumbnails.
home.howToUseStep1: In the left form, enter your one-line, optional subtext, and date. Choose your mood (calm / good / tired / focused), or add a custom mood phrase or emoji.
home.howToUseStep2: Choose a gradient or photo background. For photos, use the darken slider for text readability and pick a card ratio (9:16, 4:5, 1:1, etc.).
home.howToUseStep3: On the preview card, drag text blocks to move them and click to change color. Drag the width handle (‚ñê) on the right to adjust text width.
home.howToUseStep4: When you're happy with it, click "Save card as PNG" to download. The saved image does not include the width handle or color UI.
home.uploadHint: Any image works: portraits, landscapes, screenshots, etc.
home.overlayHint: Higher values add a darker overlay so text is easier to read.
